item.title: Stack - Implement Two Stacks In An Array
item.description: public class TwoStacks { int[] array; int idx1, idx2, cap; public TwoStacks(int cap) { this.array = new int[cap]; this.idx1 = -1; this.idx2 = cap; this.cap = cap; } public boolean isFull() { return this.idx1 == this.idx2 - 1; } public void push1(int d) throws RuntimeException { if (isFull()) { throw new RuntimeException("Stack Overflow"); } this.idx1++; this.array[this.idx1] = d; } public void push2(int d) throws RuntimeException { if (isFull()) { throw new RuntimeException("Stack Overflow"); } this.

item.title: Stack - Check for Balanced Parentheses
item.description: public class BalancedParen { static boolean isPair(char a, char b) { if (a == '(' && b == ')' || a == '[' && b == ']' || a == '{' && b == '}') { return true; } return false; } static boolean isBalance(char[] arr) { if (arr.length == 0) { return true; } Stack<Character> temp = new Stack<>(); for (int i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) { char data = arr[i]; if (data == '(' || data == '[' || data == '{') { temp.
